alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 2:16AM MST until February 22 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow along with very strong winds and reduced visibilities in blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains and Catalina and Rincon Mountains. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven
